name: Strike Solitaire & Strike Solitaire 2
description:
Strike Solitaire

Solitaire or bowling? Two in one! A unique setting for solitaire games where the action takes place in bowling hotels.

Strike Solitaire 2

This is solitaire in a unique country bowling-hotel setting, allowing you to play two games at once – bowling and solitaire.



Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.
